column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Right when I stepped in
column2: I felt as if I'd walked into a cafe in Europe. The bustling lines and tables extremely close to each other
column3: combined with the modern decor and architecture of the place
column4: gave me the nostalgic feeling that I was back in London or Paris- I LOVED it. This cafe smells like heaven
column5: and the pastries looked beautiful. Arrive expecting to wait in line
column6: but grab a menu while you wait because it seems as though the items offered for brunch can vary.
